009package imagingbook.common.ransac;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.LineFit;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.OrthogonalLineFitEigen;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
018
019/**
020 * <p>
021 * RANSAC detector for straight lines. See Sec. 12.1.2 - 12.1.3 of [1] for
022 * additional details.
023 * </p>
024 * <p>
025 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
026 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
027 * </p>
028 * 
029 * @author WB
030 * @version 2022/11/19
031 * 
032 * @see AlgebraicLine
033 * @see RansacDetector
034 */
035public class RansacLineDetector extends RansacDetector<AlgebraicLine>{
036        
037        private final Parameters params;
038        
039        /**
040         * Nested class extending {@link RansacDetector.RansacParameters} 
041         * to specify additional RANSAC parameters.
042         */
043        public static class Parameters extends RansacDetector.RansacParameters {
044                
045                /** The minimum distance between two random sample points. */
046                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Min. distance between sample points")
047                public int minPairDistance;
048                
049                /**
050                 * Constructor used to define default parameter values.
051                 */
052                public Parameters() {
053                        this.randomPointDraws = 1000;
054                        this.maxInlierDistance = 2.0;
055                        this.minInlierCount = 100;
056                        this.minPairDistance = 25;
057                }       
058        }
059        
060        // constructors ------------------------------------
061        
062        /**
063         * Constructor using specific parameters.
064         * @param params RANSAC parameters
065         */
066        public RansacLineDetector(Parameters params) {
067                super(2, params);
068                this.params = params;
069        }
070        
071        /**
072         * Constructor using default parameters.
073         */
074        public RansacLineDetector() {
075                this(new Parameters());
076        }
077        
078        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
079        
080        @Override // override default method to check for min pair distance
081        Pnt2d[] drawRandomPoints(Pnt2d[] points) {
082                final int MaxTries = 20;
083                int i = 0;
084                Pnt2d[] draw = super.drawRandomPoints(points);
085                while (draw[0].distanceSq(draw[1]) < sqr(params.minPairDistance) && i < MaxTries) {
086                        draw = super.drawRandomPoints(points);
087                        i++;
088                }
089                return (i < MaxTries) ? draw : null;
090        }
091
092        @Override
093        AlgebraicLine fitInitial(Pnt2d[] points) {
094                return AlgebraicLine.from(points[0], points[1]);
095        }
096        
097        @Override
098        AlgebraicLine fitFinal(Pnt2d[] inliers) {
099                LineFit fit = new OrthogonalLineFitEigen(inliers);
100                return fit.getLine();
101        }
102
103}
